org.zaproxy.zap.control

Class AddOnInstaller

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.zaproxy.zap.control.AddOnInstaller

  • public final class AddOnInstaller
extends Object
    Helper class responsible to install and uninstall add-ons and all its (dynamically installable) components (Extensions, Plugins, PassiveScanners and files).
    Since:
    2.3.0
    See Also:
    Extension, Plugin, PassiveScanner

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void install(AddOnClassLoader addOnClassLoader, AddOn addOn)
      Installs all the (dynamically installable) components of the given addOn.
      static void installMissingAddOnFiles(AddOnClassLoader addOnClassLoader, AddOn addOn)
      Installs all the missing files declared by the given addOn.
      static boolean uninstall(AddOn addOn)
      Uninstalls all the (dynamically installable) components of the given addOn.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • install

        public static void install(AddOnClassLoader addOnClassLoader,
           AddOn addOn)
        Installs all the (dynamically installable) components of the given addOn. Extensions, Plugins, PassiveScanners and files.

        It's also responsible to notify the installed extensions when the installation has finished by calling the method Extension#postInstall().

        Parameters:
        addOnClassLoader - the class loader of the given addOn
        addOn - the add-on that will be installed
        See Also:
        Extension, PassiveScanner, Plugin, Extension.postInstall()

      • uninstall

        public static boolean uninstall(AddOn addOn)
        Uninstalls all the (dynamically installable) components of the given addOn. Extensions, Plugins, PassiveScanners and files.
        Parameters:
        addOn - the add-on that will be uninstalled
        Returns:
        true if the add-on was uninstalled without errors, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        Extension, PassiveScanner, Plugin

      • installMissingAddOnFiles

        public static void installMissingAddOnFiles(AddOnClassLoader addOnClassLoader,
                            AddOn addOn)
        Installs all the missing files declared by the given addOn.
        Parameters:
        addOnClassLoader - the class loader of the given addOn
        addOn - the add-on that will have the missing declared files installed
